rules_text:
[i]Villager[/i] – When Cyril, Rhea's Attendant enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[i]Archbishop's Servant[/i] – Whenever you cast a Noble spell, support 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to one other target creature.)[/i]
